languages.text: "Надеюсь, вы оцените щедрость этого предложения, как оценила в свое время ваша предшественница".
"I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, вы оцените щедрость этого предложения, как оценила в свое время ваша предшественница".

traits.locale_text: "I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."
"I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."
"I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."
"I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."
"I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."

languages.text: 「この提案の寛大さに感謝してほしいものだ、お前の前任者と同じようにな」
languages.original_text: "I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."

traits.locale_text: 「この提案の寛大さに感謝してほしいものだ、お前の前任者と同じようにな」

languages.original_text: "I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."

languages.text: “我希望你会感激我的一片苦心，正如你的前任那样。”
languages.original_text: "I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."

traits.locale_text: “我希望你会感激我的一片苦心，正如你的前任那样。”

languages.text: «Espero que sepa apreciar la generosidad de mi oferta, como ya hizo su predecesora».
languages.original_text: "I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que sepa apreciar la generosidad de mi oferta, como ya hizo su predecesora».

languages.text: « J'espère que vous saurez vous montrer {mf|reconnaissant|reconnaissante} de cette offre généreuse, comme votre prédécesseure avant vous. »
languages.original_text: "I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous saurez vous montrer {mf|reconnaissant|reconnaissante} de cette offre généreuse, comme votre prédécesseure avant vous. »

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, Ihr wisst die Großzügigkeit dieses Angebots zu schätzen, wie einst Eure Vorgängerin."
languages.original_text: "I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, Ihr wisst die Großzügigkeit dieses Angebots zu schätzen, wie einst Eure Vorgängerin."

languages.text: "Umarım tıpkı selefin gibi sen de bu teklifin ne kadar cömert olduğunun farkındasındır."
languages.original_text: "I hope you appreciate the generosity of this offer, as your predecessor once did."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım bu teklifin ne kadar cömertçe olduğunu fark ediyorsundur. Tıpkı selefinin ettiği gibi."
